title: Rush Limbaugh - July 8, 2016 Full Podcast.mp3
description:
Rush Limbaugh July 8, 2016 full Podcast mp3

Heather Mac Donald Talks About Her Essential Book: The War on Cops

Hillary Is By No Means Out of the Woods, as Congressman Will Hurd's Grilling of FBI Director Comey Demonstrated

RUSH:  I thought it was like 95% trusted it.  I thought the newspeople got on their Fakebook and other feeds on social media and they were gospel to them.  Only 5% trust it.  That's tough to believe.


The Left Politicizes Violence Like We've Seen This Week to Advance Their Agenda Against Conservatives, Republicans, Guns -- and Even Donald Trump!

RUSH: Every time a militant Islamist terrorist shoots somebody up, what does Obama do and the Democrats?  They come out and they demand that there be no backlash against Muslims.  Okay.  So any time a police officer shoots a black suspect -- without knowing why, without knowing the circumstances -- why doesn't Obama stand up and warn against a backlash against cops?  If we are to guard against backlash against Muslim shooters, where is the sameness? Where is the equality, fairness, what have you?  It's a good point.  I don't think I've ever heard anybody in this Regime counsel restraint and advise, "No backlash against cops. We must maintain the order."  

Just Wait for the Conventions, Because This Violence Is Not Over

RUSH: Folks, it wouldn't matter who the nominee is. It could be Trump. It could be Jeb Bush. It doesn't matter. Just keep a sharp eye. It's just going to be a couple of weeks here. And I would love to be wrong about it. Do not misunderstand here. I'm not one of these people predicting this, hoping it does happen
 
http://www.rushlimbaugh.com/
